item.title: Five Books for Your 1st Year as a PhD student in Music and Science
item.description: When you first dive into the field of music and science as a graduate student, you might be tempted to dive straight into your niche and start reading anything and everything related to your thesis topic.

item.title: To-Dos and Boundaries
